title: 3B/2B, Fireplaces available, Situated in North Las Vegas!
posting_body: ['Your search for the perfect new apartment in North Las Vegas is over.', 'As one of the premier apartment communities, Sedona at Lone Mountain is an ideal place to call home.', 'Offering spacious one, two and three-bedroom apartments, our pet-friendly community has everything you need for a lavish and comfortable lifestyle.', '-Resident social lounge', '-Relaxing resort-style pool                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity', '-Fireplaces available', '-Virtual Moving Concierge: Complimentary address change, set up home services and digital moving announcements', '-Courtyard and mountain views', '-Move-in with NO SECURITY DEPOSIT:', 'Only a small one-time payment', '-Worry-free 24-hour onsite maintenance', '-Onsite playground', '-Private balcony or patio', '-Landscaped courtyard with outdoor seating', '-Oversized walk-in closets                                                                                                                                Select units                                                                                                                                Featured amenity', '-Air conditioning with programmable thermostat', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Prices Change Daily', 'Flexible Lease Terms']
